00014         public static void helpPrinter()
00015         {
00016                 System.out.println("  Command Line Parameters are as follows:");
00017                 System.out.println("    \"--help\" : You're looking at it");
00018                 System.out.println("    \"-p1 [AI Class Name]\" : Set player 1 to the appropriate AI");
00019                 System.out.println("      Example: -p1 StupidAI");
00020                 System.out.println("    \"-p2 [AI Class Name]\" : Set player 2 to the appropriate AI");
00021                 System.out.println("      Example: -p2 RandomAI");
00022                 System.out.println("    \"-t [Time in ms]\" : Set the maximum amount of time alloted per AI move");
00023                 System.out.println("      Example: -t 500");
00024                 System.out.println("    \"-w [int]\" : Set the width of the game board");
00025                 System.out.println("      Example: -w 7");
00026                 System.out.println("    \"-h [int]\" : Set the height of the game board");
00027                 System.out.println("      Example: -h 6");
00028                 System.out.println("    \"-text\" : Prints using a text-based I/O");
00029                 System.out.println("Note: Later command-line options override earlier ones if they are incompatable\n");
00030         }

00033         public static void main(String[] args)
00034         {
00035                 final AIModule[] players = new AIModule[2];
00036 
00037                 // Default max ai time is 500 ms
00038                 int AI_time = 500;
00039                 // Default width to 7
00040                 int width = 7;
00041                 // Default height to 6
00042                 int height = 6;
00043                 boolean text = false;
00044 
00045                 // Parse through the command line arguements
00046                 try
00047                 {
00048                         int i = 0;
00049                         while(i < args.length)
00050                         {
00051                                 if(args[i].equalsIgnoreCase("-p1"))
00052                                         players[0] = (AIModule) Class.forName(args[i + 1]).newInstance();
00053                                 else if(args[i].equalsIgnoreCase("-p2"))
00054                                         players[1] = (AIModule) Class.forName(args[i + 1]).newInstance();
00055                                 else if(args[i].equalsIgnoreCase("-t"))
00056                                 {
00057                                         AI_time = Integer.parseInt(args[i + 1]);
00058                                         if(AI_time <= 0)
00059                                                 throw new IllegalArgumentException("AI think time must be positive");
00060                                 }
00061                                 else if(args[i].equalsIgnoreCase("-w"))
00062                                 {
00063                                         width = Integer.parseInt(args[i + 1]);
00064                                         if(width < 4)
00065                                                 throw new IllegalArgumentException("Widths must be at least four.");
00066                                 }
00067                                 else if(args[i].equalsIgnoreCase("-h"))
00068                                 {
00069                                         height = Integer.parseInt(args[i + 1]);
00070                                         if(width < 4)
00071                                                 throw new IllegalArgumentException("Heights must be at least four.");
00072                                 }
00073                                 else if(args[i].equalsIgnoreCase("-text"))
00074                                 {
00075                                         text = true;
00076                                         // Compensate for i += 2
00077                                         i--;
00078                                 }
00079                                 else if(args[i].equalsIgnoreCase("--help"))
00080                                 {
00081                                         helpPrinter();
00082                                         System.exit(0);
00083                                 }
00084                                 else
00085                                         throw new IllegalArgumentException();
00086                                 i += 2;
00087                         }
00088                 }
00089                 catch(ClassNotFoundException cnf)
00090                 {
00091                         System.err.println("Player Not Found: " + cnf.getMessage());
00092                         System.exit(1);
00093                 }
00094                 catch(IndexOutOfBoundsException ioob)
00095                 {
00096                         System.err.println("Invalid Arguments");
00097                         System.exit(2);
00098                 }
00099                 catch(NumberFormatException e)
00100                 {
00101                         System.err.println("Invalid Integer: " + e.getMessage());
00102                         System.exit(3);
00103                 }
00104                 catch(IllegalArgumentException ia)
00105                 {
00106                         System.err.println("Invalid Arguments: " + ia.getMessage());
00107                         System.exit(4);
00108                 }
00109                 catch(Exception e)
00110                 {
00111                         System.err.println("Unknown Error");
00112                         System.exit(5);
00113                 }
00114 
00115                 // Create a new game
00116                 GameStateModule game;
00117                 try
00118                 {
00119                         // Load an optimized game representation if possible
00120                         game = (GameStateModule) Class.forName("GameState_Opt" + Integer.toString(width) + "x" + Integer.toString(height)).newInstance();
00121                 }
00122                 catch(Exception e)
00123                 {
00124                         // Otherwise use a generic game representation
00125                         game = new GameState_General(width, height);
00126                 }
00127 
00128                 IOModule io;
00129 
00130                 // If told so then make a graphical version of the action
00131                 if(text)
00132                         io = new TextDisplay();
00133                 else
00134                 {
00135                         final Display display = new Display();
00136                         io = display;
00137                         final JFrame frame = new JFrame("Connect Four");
00138                         frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
00139                         frame.add(display);
00140                         frame.pack();
00141                         frame.setVisible(true);
00142                 }
00143 
00144                 // Turn on the turn based system
00145                 GameController controller = new GameController(game, io, players, AI_time);
00146                 controller.play();
00147                 // Print out the results of the match
00148                 if(game.getWinner() == 0)
00149                         System.out.println("Draw Game");
00150                 else
00151                         System.out.println("Player " + game.getWinner() + " won");
00152         }
